thread.section_title: Point A Hotel, London Paddington - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good service and friendly staff
thread.title_full: Good service and friendly staff - Review of Point A Hotel, London Paddington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Ahmad R
title: Good service and friendly staff
text: Good location,easy to reach to Edgware Road station and paddington station. High recommend to the new visitor to London . The location very good especially if someone love to shopping, it would be easier for window shopping,nearest Oxford street,paddington station, Hyde park too. My conclusion worth your money .
